doc: /** * Returns the index for a given key, or -1. * * @param key the key (null not permitted). * * @return The index, or -1 if the key is unrecognised. * * @see #getKey(int) */

/**
     * Returns the number of items (values) in the collection.
     *
     * @return The item count.
     */
/** * Returns an object from the list. * * @param item the item index (zero-based). * * @return The object (possibly null). * * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if item is out of bounds. */

/**
     * Removes a value from the collection.
     *
     * @param index  the index of the item to remove.
     *
     * @see #removeValue(Comparable)
     */

/**
     * Returns the column index for a given key.
     *
     * @param key  the key.
     *
     * @return The column index.
     *
     * @see #getColumnKey(int)
     */

/**
     * Returns the key for a given column.
     *
     * @param column  the column.
     *
     * @return The key.
     *
     * @see #getColumnIndex(Comparable)
     */

/**
     * Returns the row index for a given key.
     *
     * @param key  the key.
     *
     * @return The row index.
     *
     * @see #getRowKey(int)
     */
/** * Adds or updates an object. * * @param object the object. * @param rowKey the row key (null not permitted). * @param columnKey the column key (null not permitted). */
